_xResult.title: The Essential Buttondown
_xResult.shortdesc: Custom made white buttondown with stylish balloon sleeves
_xResult.longdesc:
Ramp up your professional game with this stylish take on the most essential piece of business clothing in your closet: the white button-up shirt.

 

Made with a satin-cotton blend, this custom made blouse is extremely breathable, soft, and hangs impeccably. Wear it in a classic fashion underneath a blazer or cardigan or flaunt the balloon sleeves with cullottes or a simple black skirt. Our favorite feature is the fashion-forward, buttonless cuffs for comfort and ease!

 

The pictured top falls at hip length, but you can customize the length as you wish. Inform Samshek of the length you'd like during checkout.
